name: Irish Stock Exchange plc, trading as Euronext Dublin
goal:
The Irish Stock Exchange plc, trading as Euronext Dublin, is a global leader in the listing of fund and debt securities with over 35,000 securities from 80 countries around the world listed on its four markets. It provides a world class, internationally competitive and cost effective trading and post-trade infrastructure for its equity markets which enables trading member firms and the wider investor community to connect and enables companies to access investors and to raise international funds.

Other services include data information services, company announcements service and the issuance of security identity codes such as ISINs and LEIs.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: MiFID II/MiFIR, Prospectus Directive, CMU, Benchmarks, Market Abuse Regulation, SMEs, Corporate Governance.
